name: Slither Snake Go Plus
description:
Slither Snake Go Plus is very easy to play. just Swipe finger left or right on screen to move slither.
Move your finger on screen to move snake of balls and break the maximum bricks.
increase length of snake as you collect additional balls try to make biggest snake and try to break as many bricks as possible.
How To Play :

Swipe your finger to guide a snake of balls and break the bricks.
Try to break as many bricks as possible.
Get additional balls and make the biggest snake ever!
